recipes.title: Vegan Italian Pasta
recipes.text:
1. Cook pasta according to package instructions.
2. In a separate pan, sauté tomatoes and basil in olive oil.
3. Toss cooked pasta with the tomato and basil mixture. Serve.

recipes.title: Gluten-free Indian Curry
recipes.text:
1. Heat oil in a pan, add curry spices, and sauté until fragrant.
2. Add chicken and cook until browned.
3. Stir in coconut milk and simmer until the chicken is cooked through. Serve with rice.

recipes.title: Dairy-free Chinese Stir-fry
recipes.text:
1. Heat oil in a pan, add tofu, and stir-fry until browned.
2. Add broccoli and ginger, and stir-fry for a few more minutes.
3. Pour soy sauce over the tofu and broccoli. Serve with rice.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Mediterranean Salad
recipes.text:
1. Cook quinoa according to package instructions and let it cool.
2. In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, cucumbers, olives, and crumbled feta cheese.
3. Drizzle with your favorite Mediterranean dressing and toss to combine.

recipes.title: Beef Stir-Fry
recipes.text:
1. Heat sesame oil in a pan and stir-fry beef strips until browned. Remove from the pan.
2. In the same pan, sauté garlic and ginger. Add bell peppers and broccoli.
3. Return the beef to the pan and add soy sauce and hoisin sauce. Cook until heated through. 4. Serve over rice.

recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.text:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
2. In a separate pan, brown ground beef, onions, and garlic.
3. Add tomato sauce, red wine, and oregano. Simmer until the sauce thickens.
4. Serve the sauce over cooked spaghetti, topped with parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Vegetable Thai Green Curry
recipes.text:
1. In a pan, heat green curry paste and add tofu. Cook until tofu is browned.
2. Add sliced bell peppers, zucchini, bamboo shoots, and coconut milk. Simmer until vegetables are tender.
3. Stir in fresh basil leaves before serving over rice.

recipes.title: Homemade Margherita Pizza
recipes.text:
1. Roll out pizza dough into your desired shape.
2. Spread tomato sauce evenly on the dough, leaving a border for the crust.
3. Add fresh mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves.
4. Drizzle with olive oil.
5. Bake in a preheated oven at 475°F (245°C) for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden.

recipes.title: Miso Soup with Tofu and Seaweed
recipes.text:
1. In a pot, combine miso paste and water. Bring to a simmer.
2. Add cubed tofu and seaweed. Simmer until tofu is heated through.
3. Garnish with sliced green onions and a dash of soy sauce.
